prompt:
Recommend some configuration parameters for postgres to optimize the system's performance. Such parameters might include system-level configurations, like memory, query optimizer hints (such as join strategies, scan costs, parallelism, etc), or query-level configurations.Include index recommendations (CREATE INDEX).

Each row in the following list has the following format:
{a join key A}:{all the joins with A in the workload}.

supplier.s_nationkey: ['nation.n_nationkey']
nation.n_regionkey: ['region.r_regionkey']
partsupp.ps_suppkey: ['supplier.s_suppkey']
partsupp.ps_partkey: ['part.p_partkey']
orders.o_custkey: ['customer.c_custkey']
lineitem.l_orderkey: ['lineitem.l_orderkey', 'orders.o_orderkey']
customer.c_nationkey: ['nation.n_nationkey']
lineitem.l_suppkey: ['supplier.s_suppkey']
orders.o_orderkey: ['lineitem.l_orderkey']
customer.c_custkey: ['orders.o_custkey']
part.p_partkey: ['lineitem.l_partkey']
supplier.s_suppkey: ['--', 'lineitem.l_suppkey', 'partsupp.ps_suppkey']
lineitem.l_partkey: ['part.p_partkey']
nation.n_nationkey: ['customer.c_nationkey', 'supplier.s_nationkey']

The workload runs on a system with the following specs:memory: 32GiB
cores: 4

Your response should strictly consist of a python-compatible JSON response of the following schema. Do not include any additional text in the prompt, such as descriptions or intros. Return just apython-compatible list only.
{
	commands: [list of the SQL commands]
}

message.content:
{
	"commands": [
		"SET shared_buffers = '8GB';",
		"SET work_mem = '256MB';",
		"SET effective_cache_size = '24GB';",
		"SET maintenance_work_mem = '2GB';",
		"SET random_page_cost = 1.1;",
		"SET effective_io_concurrency = 200;",
		"SET max_parallel_workers_per_gather = 2;",
		"SET max_parallel_workers = 4;",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_supplier_nationkey ON supplier(s_nationkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_nation_regionkey ON nation(n_regionkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_partsupp_suppkey ON partsupp(ps_suppkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_partsupp_partkey ON partsupp(ps_partkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_orders_custkey ON orders(o_custkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_lineitem_orderkey ON lineitem(l_orderkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_customer_nationkey ON customer(c_nationkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_lineitem_suppkey ON lineitem(l_suppkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_orders_orderkey ON orders(o_orderkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_customer_custkey ON customer(c_custkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_part_partkey ON part(p_partkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_supplier_suppkey ON supplier(s_suppkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_lineitem_partkey ON lineitem(l_partkey);",
		"CREATE INDEX idx_nation_nationkey ON nation(n_nationkey);"
	]
}
